entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 8:49 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:49 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
